en.name: Hieroglyph Lithograph
en.effect: Pay 1000 Life Points. During the current Duel, your hand size limit becomes 7.

fr.name: Lithographie de Hiéroglyphes
fr.effect: Payez 1000 Life Points. Durant le duel en cours, la limite du nombre de cartes de votre main devient de 7 cartes.

de.name: Hieroglyphen-Lithographie
de.effect: Zahle 1000 Life Points. Während dieses Duells ist in deiner End Phase die Begrenzung für die Anzahl der Karten auf deiner Hand 7 Karten.

it.name: Geroglifico Litografo
it.effect: Paga 1000 Life Points. Durante il Duello in corso, il tuo limite di carte in mano diventa 7 carte.

pt.name: Hieróglifo Litografado
pt.effect: Pague 1000 Life Points. Durante o Duelo atual, o limite da sua mão na sua End Phase torna-se 7 cards.

es.name: Litografía Hieroglifo
es.effect: Paga 1000 Life Points. Durante el Duelo en curso, el límite de tu mano en tu End Phase se convierte en 7 cartas.

ja.name: ヒエログリフの石版
ja.effect: １０００ライフポイントを払う。そのデュエル中、自分の手札制限枚数が７枚になる。

ko.name: 히에로글리프의 석판
ko.effect: 1000 라이프 포인트를 지불한다.그 듀얼 중, 자신의 패 제한 매수가 7장이 된다.
